intro.description1: At Global Car Services, we offer a comprehensive service to ensure your vehicle's optimal performance. Our qualified technicians perform a thorough inspection of all essential components.
intro.description2: Regular servicing is essential to extend your vehicle's lifespan and prevent costly repairs. Trust our expertise for a complete and professional service.

inspection.title: Complete Inspection
inspection.description: Thorough check of all mechanical and electronic systems

performance.title: Performance Check
performance.description: Evaluation of engine, transmission, and brake performance

safety.title: Safety Check
safety.description: Inspection of safety elements such as brakes, tires, suspension, and lighting

emissions.title: Emissions Check
emissions.description: Verification of exhaust system and emission levels to ensure environmental compliance

frequency.question: How often should I get my car serviced?
frequency.answer: We recommend a complete service every 20,000 to 30,000 km or every two years, whichever comes first. Frequency may vary depending on the model, age of the vehicle, and your driving habits.

difference.question: What's the difference between maintenance and service?
difference.answer: Maintenance involves regular operations like oil changes or filter replacement. Service is more comprehensive and includes a thorough inspection of all vehicle systems, with replacement of worn parts if necessary.

preparation.question: How do I prepare my vehicle for service?
preparation.answer: No special preparation is needed. However, it's helpful to note any problems or unusual behavior you've noticed so our technicians can pay special attention to these areas.

report.question: Do I receive a detailed report after the service?
report.answer: Yes, after each service, you receive a detailed report indicating the condition of each checked item, work performed, and our recommendations for future interventions if needed.

hero.title: Rental Conditions
hero.subtitle: All important information about renting our vehicles

general.title: General Conditions
general.subtitle: Important information for renting your vehicle

driver.title: Driver Requirements
driver.content:
• Valid European driving license B (no provisional license)
• Minimum 2 years license or 25 years old
• Copy of ID card and driving license required
• Additional drivers possible with surcharge

documents.title: Required Documents
documents.content:
• Valid ID
• Valid European driving license
• Credit card in the name of the main driver
• Signed rental agreement

payment.title: Payment and Deposit
payment.content:
• Deposit via credit card hold
• Refund after vehicle inspection
• Invoices payable on due date
• In case of damage: fixed compensation €500 per incident

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.content:
• Liability insurance included
• Deductible in case of damage
• Optional extensions:
  - Reduced deductible
  - Driver insurance
  - Tire and glass protection

usage.title: Usage Conditions
usage.content:
• Use as a good caretaker
• Prohibited:
  - Smoking or vaping
  - Animals (except in closed carrier)
  - Driving off paved roads
• Tank minimum 1/4 full when returning
• Return vehicle clean

mileage.title: Mileage
mileage.content:
Included kilometers:
• Half day: 75 km
• Day: 200 km
• Weekend: 400 km
• 5 days: 750 km
• Week: 1000 km

Surcharge per extra km:
• Vans: €0.21
• Minibus: €0.19
• Refrigerated vehicles: €0.28

accident.title: In Case of Accident
accident.content:
• Immediately inform GLOBAL CAR SERVICES
• Call police if necessary
• Stay on site until advised otherwise
• Do not admit liability
• Note contact details of other parties

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Changes
cancellation.content:
• Cancellation: 40% of total amount as compensation
• Changes possible with additional costs
• Late return: 50% surcharge on daily rate
• Traffic fines will be charged

basic.title: Basic Coverage
basic.description: All our vehicles are liability insured. A deductible applies in case of damage.

late.title: Late Return
late.description: Any delay in returning the vehicle will be charged at the daily rate plus 50%.

traffic.title: Traffic Violations
traffic.description: Fines and costs related to traffic violations are the responsibility of the renter.

pickup.question: Can I pick up the vehicle at a different time?
pickup.answer: Yes, we offer flexible pickup and return times. Contact us to make an appointment outside regular opening hours.

damage.question: What happens in case of damage to the vehicle?
damage.answer: In case of damage, a fixed compensation of €500 per incident applies. The deductible will be deducted from the deposit. Major damage is handled through the insurance company. For tire damage, you are responsible for repair or replacement.

extension.question: Can I extend the rental period?
extension.answer: Yes, extension is possible if the vehicle is available. Contact us as early as possible to arrange the extension.

included.question: What is included in the rental price?
included.answer: The rental price includes: liability insurance, mileage according to chosen formula, 24/7 breakdown service, and a clean, fueled vehicle at pickup.

insurance.question: Am I insured for all damage?
insurance.answer: The vehicle is liability insured with a deductible. You can optionally choose additional insurance such as reduced deductible, driver insurance, and tire and glass protection. Note: damage due to not observing height restrictions or off-road driving is not covered by insurance.

story.paragraph1: In 2013, Samir started with one car lift and a clear conviction: if you work honestly and know your trade, success will follow. Under the name RS Cars, he built something bigger step by step.
story.paragraph2: What began as a one-man business has grown into a professional garage and rental service today. We combine years of experience with personal service, and continue to invest in quality, both in our team and in our infrastructure.
